description.lang: ROC Connect smart home is a simple and convenient solution to turn your home into a Smart Home. With an entire set of smart sensors, lights, plugs, and other connected products you can take control and interact with your home from anywhere:- set up schedules to automatically operate lights and plugs- receive notifications from smart sensors in your home when e.g. doors are being opened or a water leak has been detected- create rules to automate the behavior of your smart devices- check the cameras in your home to see if your kids returned home safely- check the history to track all events that happened in your home- control several places (your home, office), all from one accountYou can do all of the above and more from anywhere in the world. Start building your smart home today.
